title: Leaver Warning ~~ Really  rito
body:
Dear Riot o/ 

Time Approx Thursday 12:20PM (lunch) Australian East coast time.

I thought, O.K Rift is taking to long, well past the Estimated time of a under 2 minutes. 

So I think, I'll do a Aram then.
So eventually I get into a Aram game

Only **4 humans total out of 10 **
>>> But **3 humans are in enemy team!  **
~ ~    Why?
There is no logic..
Why not two humans on each team at least?

I'd just made level 18 yesterday.
**Aram the bots AI is pathetic.
I didn't even bother to play. **

**Then i get a leaver buster warning ....**
Really .. .could you seriously blame me for wanting the game to be over asap?? 
**Put yourself in the players position... why prolong the inevitable sad AI bots feeding...
**
_I'm so agitated by this situation!_ 
It's definitely not a positive scenario regarding player satisfaction at all! 

Not salt or even cancer. 
So beyond disappointed ...

replies.body: You afk and then you are surprised to get a leaver buster warning. Smh...

First of all, its an automated system, so it can't detect the circumstances for your absence. 

Second, it was only a warning, so why are you complaining

Third, its ARAM. Don't have a cow man. A lot of bots and scripts use ARAM to farm cause they are quick games that often no one cares about. Report them after the game, and mention them to the riot support team.
